name: Grasshopper Cheesecake Bars
author: 1cowabunga
summary: Delicious mint cheesecake sandwiched between two layers of crispy chocolate. Excellent for Christmas cookies!
ingredients: 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, at room temperature
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Mix flour, sugar, and cocoa powder in a large bowl
Cut in butter until mixture resembles fine crumbs
Set aside 1 cup of the crumbs to be used as the topping
Press remaining crumb mixture into an ungreased 8x8-inch baking pan
Bake crust in the preheated oven until set, about 15 minutes
While crust is cooling, beat cream cheese and sugar with an electric mixer until fluffy
Add egg, peppermint extract, and green food coloring; beat well
Stir in milk until batter is smooth
Pour batter over the cooled crust
Sprinkle reserved crumb mixture on top
Bake until filling is set, 20 to 25 minutes
